<@URN898S15> - I am trying to extend the plotting recipe you made in Shapefile.jl for Shapefile.Table plotting to support choropleth mapping. Right now, I want to apply custom colors to each choropleth region shown in my attached image. So far, I have tried something like this

```@recipe function plot(t::Shapefile.Table; customcolor = :green)
    getshp(t)
    background_color := customcolor
end

plot(x, axis = ([], false), fmt = :png; customcolor = :red)```
To at least change the background color. However, the recipe doesn't seem to be doing anything. What am I doing incorrectly?
